title: Escarole, cannellini bean and tomato salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 heads of escarole or endive leaves, washed and chopped', '300g cherry tomatoes', '1 (400g) tin cannellini beans, drained', '4 tablespoons freshly chopped basil', '1 teaspoon salt']
